# Regret {#sec-regret}

Hello


$$
\text{Regret}(a) = u(a, s_{-i}) - u(s_i, s_{-i})
$$

where:
\begin{align*}
a &: \text{the action being evaluated} \\
s_i &: \text{the strategy actually played} \\
s_{-i} &: \text{the opponent's strategy} \\
u(\cdot, \cdot) &: \text{the utility function}
\end{align*}
